articles.title: South African airline Comair's fleet grounded indefinitely - Reuters.com
articles.description: South Africa's civil aviation regulator grounded Comair's planes indefinitely on Sunday over unresolved safety issues, in a move that also affects low-cost airline Kulula and British Airways, leaving hundreds of passengers stranded.
